Package us.jbec.lct.security

Class AuthorizedUser

java.lang.Object
us.jbec.lct.security.AuthorizedUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Principal, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails
public class AuthorizedUser extends Object implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails, Principal, Serializable
POJO to represent an Authorized User of the application for Spring Security purposes. Many classes are overridden or return hard-coded values, because we let Firebase handle the relevant concerns.
See Also:
